subtitleNullable: 5.7M daily listings from ~1.2k dealers in Illinois between June 2018-2020
descriptionNullable:
### Context
The data is provided as a sample from [AutoDealerData.com](https://AutoDealerData.com/?ref=kaggle). 

This dataset contains 5.7 million new and used vehicle listings (~2M unique vins) from aprox 1.2k dealers in Illinois from June 2018 to June 2020 with a daily resolution. More data can be pulled [via our API with a subscription](https://AutoDealerData.com/pricing?ref=kaggle).

We maintain a database of the US automotive market with over 550M vehicles and 40k dealerships updated daily. Data is available from 2016 to yesterday for dealers all over the US with a few simple calls to one of our dozens of API endpoints. 


### Content

Vins in this free sample have been masked with an hmac. Vehicles with the same vins will have matching hmac values.


### Acknowledgements


### Inspiration
